title: ‘The energy, the vibe, it feels like family’ – the mood at an election rally
description: Exhausted by the US election? We take you to a Trump and Harris rally to feel the excitement on both sides.
excerpt: Exhausted by the US election? We take you to a Trump and Harris rally to feel the excitement on both sides.
text: In a deeply divided America, many already feel exhausted by the election. But there is genuine energy and excitement too, from supporters on both sides. In this split-screen video, we take you to Michigan to get a feel for what it's like among the crowds at a Donald Trump rally and one for Kamala Harris.Trump addressed crowds in Traverse City, while Harris, joined by former First Lady Michelle Obama, rallied supporters in Kalamazoo. Video by Eloise Alanna
html:
In a deeply divided America, many already feel exhausted by the election. But there is genuine energy and excitement too, from supporters on both sides.

In this split-screen video, we take you to Michigan to get a feel for what it's like among the crowds at a Donald Trump rally and one for Kamala Harris.

Trump addressed crowds in Traverse City, while Harris, joined by former First Lady Michelle Obama, rallied supporters in Kalamazoo.

Video by Eloise Alanna
